mapper.select: SELECT idx, title, content, userId, viewCnt, insertTime, updateTime FROM atworks_board ORDER BY idx DESC
mapper.insert: insert into atworks_board (title, content, userId, viewCnt, insertTime, updateTime) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, default, default, null);
mapper.update: UPDATE atworks_board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updateTime = now() WHERE idx = #{idx}
